verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Have your way, have your way
Holy Spirit, fill our hearts and have your way
As we wait,
As we pray
Speak your word into our hearts
and have your way

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ten tu manera
Ten tu manera
Espiritu Santo, invade nuestro Corazon y ten tu propia manera
Mientras esperamos
sella tu amor en nuestro corazon
